Article Title: Wayne Gretzky’s daughter Paulina Gretzky shows up for her husband as eyes remain on her legendary father
Article Text:
Image via Ryan Remiorz/CP

Paulina Gretzky’s heartwarming gesture to her husband comes days after she kept quiet while Wayne Gretzky got trolled



Image via Michael Reaves/Getty Images

Wayne Gretzky ’s older daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has now been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, Dustin Johnson , as the two were spotted in Georgia for the Masters Tournament, which began on 10th April. Recently, a picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive Paulina Gretzky has been of her husband’s career.Paulina Gretzky and her husband, Dustin Johnson, were spotted before the tournament began on 10th April as Johnson participated in the Masters Par 3 Contest.Paulina Gretzky looked stunning as she wore a white shirt and pants along with white shoes and walked hand in hand with her husband as she carried his golf kit.Both looked happy as the two laughed and were seen speaking to each other. A few days ago, Paulina Gretzky was also seen at LIV Golf Miami to be with her husband. The two took a private jet from Miami and then landed in Augusta, Georgia where the Masters Tournament began from 10th April.The NHL legend, Wayne Gretzky, was last spotted when Alex Ovechkin tied with him at 894 goals. Wayne Gretzky was spotted cheering for Alex Ovechkin as the crowd gave him a standing ovation at the Chicago Blackhawks’ recent match.Wayne Gretzky complimented Alex Ovechkin’s efforts and said, “I can tell you firsthand I know how hard it is to get to 894, 895 is pretty special. They say records are meant to be broken, but I’m not sure who’s gonna get more goals than that.”Wayne Gretzky also made an appearance on TNT and said, “I was really happy for him, I felt like I scored the goal, does that make any sense? I know the pressure he was under, the microscope he was under, honestly I was relieved”.However, Wayne Gretzky’s children have stayed away from all the mess that the NHL legend had found himself in. Paulina Gretzky did not issue any statements when her father was getting trolled as fans believed that he supported Team USA at the 4 Nations Final match.The NHL legend has also not addressed the controversy in public and has kept himself away from all the mess.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Paulina Gretzky flaunts her luxurious life as Wayne Gretzky receives a standing ovation
Article Summary: Paulina gretzky has been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, dustin johnson. The two were spotted in augusta, georgia for the masters tournament, which began on 10th april. A picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive she has been of her husband’s career.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Who stands where after DC vs MI match
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Mumbai Indians registered a crucial 12-run win over Delhi Capitals at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi, adding two valuable points to their tally in the IPL 2025 season. The win has added more intrigue to the points table , which is now shaping up to be tightly contested as the tournament progresses.With this defeat, Delhi Capitals slipped to second on the table with 8 points from 5 matches. Axar Patel’s side had won four on the bounce before this defeat and still boast an impressive net run rate of +0.899.Gujarat Titans currently sit at the top of the table with 8 points from 6 matches. With 4 wins and a healthy net run rate of +1.081, the Titans have shown solid form and consistency so far, keeping them narrowly ahead of the rest.Royal Challengers Bengaluru also find themselves level on points with Gujarat and Delhi, having won 4 of their 6 matches. With a net run rate of +0.672, RCB sit third, thanks to a mix of explosive batting performances and improved bowling in recent games.Lucknow Super Giants are also tied on 8 points from 6 matches. They’re fourth in the standings, with a comparatively lower net run rate of +0.162.Kolkata Knight Riders, with 3 wins and 3 losses from 6 games, hold the fifth spot. Their net run rate of +0.803 keeps them above Punjab Kings, despite having the same number of points (6).Punjab Kings are sixth with 6 points from 5 matches and a marginally positive net run rate of +0.065.Mumbai Indians, after their win against Delhi Capitals, now have 4 points from 6 matches. They move to seventh place with a net run rate of +0.104, giving them a glimmer of hope for a mid-season turnaround.Rajasthan Royals also sit on 4 points from 6 games but are placed eighth due to a negative NRR of -0.838.Sunrisers Hyderabad are ninth with 2 wins and 4 losses. Their poor net run rate of -1.245 has been a major concern.Chennai Super Kings, languishing at the bottom, have just one win from six matches and a worrying NRR of -1.554, putting them in a tough spot going forward.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians registered a crucial 12-run win over delhi capitals at the arun jaitley stadium in delhi. The win has added more intrigue to the points table, which is now shaping up to be tightly contested. Gujarat titans currently sit at the top of the table with 8 points from 6 matches.

Article Title: DC Vs MI IPL 2025: No bowlers, only throwdowns: How Rohit Sharma's struggle for runs eases with a welcome victory in Delhi
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you believe the Mumbai Indians can turn their season around after this win? Maybe, depends on next games No, it's too late Yes, absolutely

'I was under pressure': SRH's Abhishek Sharma after a record 141 against Punjab Kings

'Easy to judge from the studio': Shardul Thakur slams commentators after LSG's win over GT

NEW DELHI: "DC ke saarein khatam ho gaye hain, sahab (Sir, the DC ones are all sold out)," sighed an agitated jersey seller outside the Arun Jaitley Stadium .He wasn’t alone.On a crowded Jawaharlal Nehru Marg, vendors echoed the same tone as Delhi Capitals jerseys had vanished from the shelves -- a mere representation of the team’s unbeaten run in the 18th season of the Indian Premier League (IPL).With DC jerseys in short supply, neutrals, who had just arrived to enjoy a game of IPL on Sunday evening, opted for what hadn't run out of stock yet: a Mumbai Indians jersey with “Rohit” embedded on the back.Inside the stadium, when Jasprit Bumrah was teaching the iconic helicopter shot to Will Jacks, Rohit kept his warm-up light.The ex-Mumbai captain was also seen chatting with DC physio Patrick Farhart, a familiar face from his Team India days.The crowd cheered the loudest when the announcer confirmed Rohit's presence in the MI XI after Delhi won the toss and chose to field first.Opening the innings, Rohit took strike against Mitchell Starc, who operated from the Gautam Gambhir Stand end.For the first couple of overs, the 37-year-old focused on playing it with soft hands and rotating strike, facing just two balls for two runs.But it was Ryan Rickelton's explosive hitting that seemed to spark something in Rohit.In Starc’s second over, Rohit joined the party, smacking 14 runs off the 19-run over -- flashes of his vintage T20 World Cup Super 8s innings against Australia came to being.However, the fire fizzled quickly.While Mukesh Kumar’s pace troubled him in the following over, 20-year-old leggie Vipraj Nigam brought his innings to an end with a sharp delivery that caught the former skipper off guard.An LBW shout and a subsequent review drew the first blood at 47. Keeping his head down, Rohit walked off with 18 off 12.It was yet another short stay this season: 0, 8, 13, 17, and now 18.There’s a slow upward trend, and Rohit will be hoping to break free from this streak in the games ahead.A day before the match, he, however, had kept the lights on at the Arun Jaitley nets longer than anyone else.Mumbai Indians arrived first for training at around 5:30 PM, and while DC wound up early, Rohit had only just begun his session.Earlier in the evening, he was mostly observing, quietly going through fitness routines. With his knee strapped, many assumed he wouldn’t bat.But he eventually geared up, put on the pads. After some solo knocking on one side of the ground, he headed to the nets.Interestingly, Rohit, however, didn't face any bowlers: only a 30-minute round of throwdown. Thus, the training session, which was supposed to end at 8:30 PM, concluded thirty minutes later.Even then, the trademark big hits were missing. None of his big hits cleared the boundary and reached the stands. The signs of struggle were clear.Backed by strong batting displays from Rickelton (41), Suryakumar Yadav (40), Tilak Varma (59), and Naman Dhir (38 not out), MI reached 205/5. Rohit Sharma showed glimpses of agility before making way for impact sub Karn Sharma, who turned the tide with a match-defining 3/36, dismissing the dangerous Karun Nair (89) and swinging momentum MI’s way.An edge-of-the-seat finish saw three successive run-outs as Delhi were bowled out for 193 in 19 overs.What followed was the blue wave of celebration as it secured Mumbai’s second win in six games. Now, whether this sparks a turnaround in their IPL season remains to be seen.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians beat delhi capitals by eight wickets. Rohit sharma scored 18 runs off 12 balls. Ryan rickelton (41), suryakumar yadav (40), tilak varma (59), and naman dhir (38 not out) contributed to mi's win. Rohit sharma showed glimpses of agility before making way for impact sub karn sharma, who turned the tide with a match-defining 3/36.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s viral dance to Kendrick Lamar’s ‘Not like us’ makes waves, and Carmelo Anthony weighs in on the GOAT’s request
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Carmelo Anthony discusses Michael Jordan's dance to 'Not Like Us'

People observe Michael Jordan whenever he dances among others. A video is going viral where we see Michael Jordan dancing to the Kendrick Lamar song "Not Like Us" thus sparking all sorts of public reaction.During his podcast 7PM in Brooklyn Carmelo Anthony analyzed this moment by questioning if Jordan’s song request at the club officially made it an anthem. Anthony uses his thoughts to explain how sports meet music while creating social change.Carmelo Anthony and his co-hosts discussed the viral video of Michael Jordan dancing to Kendrick Lamar's "Not Like Us." This track, which is notorious for its sharp critique of Drake, has sparked both controversy and praise. Anthony made a funny remark, "Is 'Not Like Us' officially the GOAT diss song after the GOAT himself requested it to be played in the club?" He further added, "He GOATed it," highlighting the weight of Jordan's influence in popularizing the song.The conversation also highlighted the swift popularity of "Not Like Us" in clubs. Anthony was taken aback that Kendrick Lamar's song started to gain momentum ahead of Drake's, pointing out, "He beat him [Drake] to the club. That was usually a Drake move." The song's infectious hook and instant charm made it a quick favorite in nightlife spots. The panelists noted that Lamar's knack for grabbing the club's attention with this track marks a significant cultural change.After this fans are giving all sorts of reaction one user on twitter commented, “Drake at home throwing away all his J’s rn, crying, bout to caption some bs like “washed goats requesting my competition, SGA taking your spot, that’s a Canadian premonition”.While another couldn’t even believe what he had just seen and said, “Is this real? Lol”. One user commented on Twitter, "Fam it's real tears coming from my eyes right now lmaoo. MJ doesn't even f**k with rap. This is a sick ass visual.".Well, people couldn't even believe what they were seeing, some people are arguing whether this incident is going to reignite Drake vs Kendrick Lamar's beef again.Next to their music discussion they exchanged thoughts about how celebrity power impacts music popularity. Anthony explained that a song supported by Michael Jordan transforms personal preference into an expression of cultural significance.Well this isn’t the first time when MJ was spotted dancing, Iin 2018, Jordan was captured on video dancing at a nightclub alongside Charlotte Hornets guard Dwayne Bacon, showcasing his lively presence and engaging with fans and players alike.In 2023, Jordan attended an Usher concert in Las Vegas, where he received VIP treatment, including a shoutout from the performer and a playful dance from actress Tiffany Haddish, highlighting his enduring charisma and influence in entertainment circles.Also Read: "The good part of the season is coming" — Luka Doncic prepares for NBA playoffs after jam-packed week of appearances When Michael Jordan performed his dance routine to "Not Like Us" by Kendrick Lamar got him widespread media attention because celebrities possess deep power over musical trends.
Article Summary: Carmelo anthony and his co-hosts discussed the viral video of michael jordan dancing to kendrick lamar's "not like us" this track, which is notorious for its sharp critique of drake, has sparked both controversy and praise. The panelists noted that lamar's knack for grabbing the club's attention with this track marks a significant cultural change.

Article Title: IPL match today, LSG vs CSK: Team prediction, head-to-head, Ekana Cricket Stadium pitch report, Lucknow weather update
Article Text:
Rishabh Pant and MS Dhoni (BCCI/IPL Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

'Things can turn around quickly': Hussey after CSK's fifth straight defeat

LSG vs CSK: Ekana Cricket Stadium pitch report

LSG vs CSK: Playing XI team prediction

Lucknow Super Giants predicted XI

'X-factor and variations': Quinton de Kock praises Narine-Varun duo after CSK collapse

Chennai Super Kings predicted XI

LSG vs CSK: Squads

Lucknow Super Giants Squad:

Chennai Super Kings Squad:

From golden duck to 39-ball ton! Priyansh Arya follows Ricky Ponting's first-ball six advice

LSG vs CSK: Head to Head

LSG vs CSK: Weather report

NEW DELHI: Desperate to arrest their slide, the Chennai Super Kings (CSK) will be hoping for a change in fortunes when they face the in-form Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) in Match 30 of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 at the Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium today (April 14).CSK find themselves under mounting pressure, having suffered five consecutive defeats — a rare slump for the five-time champions. Their woes have been compounded by a lack of firepower in the middle-order and over-reliance on the top-order batters. Adding to their misery, CSK have lost three home games in a row at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai, marking a first in the franchise’s storied IPL history.The return of M.S. Dhoni as captain, following Ruturaj Gaikwad’s injury, failed to inspire a turnaround in their last outing against the Kolkata Knight Riders. As they head into this crucial fixture, CSK will be desperate for a complete performance with both bat and ball to snap their losing streak.In contrast, LSG are riding a wave of confidence after a commanding six-wicket win over Gujarat Titans. With four victories in six games, they sit comfortably at third in the points table. CSK, meanwhile, are languishing at the bottom, managing just one win from six matches.The two sides have faced off five times in IPL history, with LSG holding a slight edge—winning three encounters, while one ended without a result. As both teams gear up for this pivotal clash, CSK will be eyeing redemption, while LSG look to keep their winning momentum going.The surface at the Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow is expected to be a balanced one, offering assistance to both pacers and spinners. Given the conditions, both teams are likely to prefer chasing at this venue.Nicholas Pooran (wk), Rishabh Pant (C), A Badoni, Himmat Singh, DA Miller, AK Markram, Abdul Samad, Shahbaz Ahmed, Ravi Bishnoi, Akash Deep, Shardul ThakurDevon Conway, MS Dhoni (C), S Dubey, Deepak Hooda, Rachin Ravindra, RA Jadeja, Vijay Shankar, Ravichandran Ashwin, Matheesha Pathirana, Noor Ahmad, KK AhmedNicholas Pooran, Ravi Bishnoi, Mayank Yadav, Ayush Badoni, Rishabh Pant, David Miller, Aiden Markram, Mitchell Marsh, Avesh Khan, Abdul Samad, Aryan Juyal, Akash Deep, Himmat Singh, Manimaran Siddharth, Digvesh Singh, Shahbaz Ahmed, Akash Singh, Shamar Joseph, Prince Yadav, Yuvraj Chaudhary, RS Hangargekar, Arshin Kulkarni, Matthew Breetzke, Mohsin KhanRuturaj Gaikwad, Shaik Rasheed, Andre Siddarth C, Rahul Tripathi, Devon Conway, MS Dhoni, Vansh Bedi, Shivam Dube, Ravindra Jadeja, Vijay Shankar, Deepak Hooda, Anshul Kamboj, Rachin Ravindra, Jamie Overton, Kamlesh Nagarkoti, Ramakrishna Ghosh, Ravichandran Ashwin, Sam Curran, Matheesha Pathirana, Shreyas Gopal, Mukesh Choudhary, Nathan Ellis, Gurjapneet Singh, Noor Ahmad, Khaleel AhmedLSG currently occupy fourth spot on the points table, having won four of their six matches. In stark contrast, CSK find themselves at the bottom, with just one win from six outings. The two sides have faced each other five times in IPL history, with LSG holding the upper hand—winning three of those encounters, while one match ended without a result.The evening weather in Lucknow on April 14 is expected to be clear and pleasant, with the temperature around 27°C and a real feel of 25°C. Skies will remain cloud-free with 0% cloud cover, ensuring excellent visibility up to 10 km. There is no chance of precipitation, and humidity will hover at a comfortable 42%. Winds will blow from the south-southeast at 9 km/h, with gusts reaching up to 24 km/h. With a dew point of 15°C and no rain expected, conditions are ideal for an uninterrupted match.
Article Summary: Chennai super kings (csk) face lucknow super giants (lsg) in match 30 of the indian premier league (ipl) 2025 at the ekana cricket stadium today (april 14) csk have suffered five consecutive defeats, while lsg are riding a wave of confidence after a commanding six-wicket win over gujarat titans.

Article Title: Taylor Swift sent a heartwarming gift to Travis Kelce’s family days before the Kanye West controversy broke out
Article Text:
Image via Gotham/GC Images

Taylor Swift sent a heartwarming gift to Jason Kelce and Kylie Kelce days before the Kanye West controversy



Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce SURPRISED Jason & Kylie with these sweet GIFTS for Baby Finnley

Kanye West made sexually explicit posts about Taylor Swift’s lives and involved other pop stars in it



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have found themselves going through a pretty difficult time since the Super Bowl. With the whole controversy related to the sexually explicit posts made by famous rapper Kanye West on X, things look pretty sensitive for the billionaire pop sensation, Taylor Swift. But it seems like amidst the mess, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are looking at the positive side of their lives, and their recent gesture for Jason Kelce and his wife, Kylie Kelce, has been heartwarming.On 30th March, Jason Kelce and his wife, Kylie Kelce, welcomed their fourth daughter, Finnley “Finn” Anne, into the world.As per Life & Style, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce surprised the new parents with a heartwarming gift. A source has revealed to Life & Style that "They were greeted with a huge assortment of flowers and other little gifts from Taylor and Travis.”The source also added, “It was a really sweet gesture that meant a lot to both of them."While Taylor Swift did not publicly congratulate Jason Kelce and Kylie Kelce, she broke her social media silence by “liking” their first post about their fourth daughter.While Taylor Swift has always been known for her heartwarming gifts to close friends and family, things have become worse for the pop star.Taylor Swift was already dealing with the Blake Lively - Justin Baldoni legal drama and also faced brutal trolling at Super Bowl LIX where her boyfriend’s team, the Kansas City Chiefs lost the match. Now there is a new scandal and it involves sexually explicit details about Taylor Swift’s life.For the unversed, Taylor Swift has had a feud with rapper, Kanye West since 2009. While the pop star has mostly kept herself away from the mess, Kanye West has been taking jabs at her.Recently, Kanye West shocked fans when he made a series of posts on X which he later deleted.One of Kanye West’s now deleted posts on X read as, “Justin Bieber and Harry Styles f***ed Taylor Swift from both sides and didn’t call me. I can’t hold water. ON EVEYTHIIING THIS TWEET IS ONE THOUSAND PERCENT TRUE,”While another post read as, “IM MAD I HAVENT F***ED TAYLOR SWIFT … YET.”While Taylor Swift’s fans have brutally trolled Kanye West, the pop star has not issued a public statement yet. As per Daily Mail, the pop star has taken the legal route against Kanye West and has filed cease and desist against him.According to Daily Mail, Travis Kelce is also pretty frustrated with the situation and wants a "man to man" conversation with him.Also Read: “Ye has gone too far”: Travis Kelce set to take matters into his own hands after Kanye West’s shocking sexually explicit posts about Taylor Swift go viral
Article Summary: Taylor swift sent a heartwarming gift to jason kelce and kylie kelce days before the kanye west controversy. Kanye west made sexually explicit posts about taylor swift’s lives and involved other pop stars in it. Taylor swift has taken the legal route against kanye west and has filed cease and desist against him.

Article Title: Watch: Karun Nair targets Jasprit Bumrah in IPL comeback blitz, slams 22-ball fifty
Article Text:
Karun Nair marked his IPL return with a sensational 22-ball fifty, igniting Delhi Capitals' chase against Mumbai Indians. His explosive assault on Bumrah in the powerplay, including two sixes and a four, shifted the momentum after an early setback. Despite Tilak Varma's earlier 59 for MI, Nair's fireworks put Delhi in a strong position.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

50-plus runs in overs 1-6 of an IPL match for DC

WATCH:

Most runs scored off Bumrah in an over in IPL

NEW DELHI: Karun Nair announced his IPL comeback in spectacular style with a blistering 22-ball half-century, his first in seven years, powering Delhi Capitals to a flying start against Mumbai Indians at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Sunday.The highlight of his knock was a stunning assault on Jasprit Bumrah in the final over of the powerplay that brought the crowd to its feet and left even MI skipper Hardik Pandya applauding.Chasing 206, DC were jolted early as Jake Fraser-McGurk was dismissed off the first ball by Deepak Chahar . But Nair, playing his first IPL match since 2022, joined Abishek Porel and turned the tide with fearless intent. The pair raced to a fifty-run partnership within five overs, with Nair taking charge.78 (24) - Jake Fraser McGurk vs MI, 202450 (20) - Jake Fraser McGurk vs RR, 202450 (22) - Karun Nair vs MI, 2025*Nair was on 32 when Bumrah returned for his second over in the sixth. He smashed the first ball for a six over backward square leg, followed it with a boundary, and then hammered another six over long-off. A couple off the final ball of the over brought up his milestone — a 22-ball fifty — becoming only the second DC batter after Fraser-McGurk to reach a half-century inside the powerplay.Nair was eventually dismissed by Mitchell Santner in the 12th over for 89. He smashed five sixes and 12 fours in his 40-ball whirlwind knock. He added 119 runs for the opening wicket with Porel (33 off 25 balls) to set the foundation of the run chase.Earlier, Tilak Varma’s 59 off 33, dominated by his signature mid-wicket strokes, helped MI post 205/5. Naman Dhir supported well with 38 not out. Despite Varma’s heroics, it was Nair’s comeback fireworks that stole the show, putting Delhi firmly in the hunt.26 - Pat Cummins (KKR), 202220 - DJ Bravo (CSK), 201818 - Karun Nair (DC), 2025*17 - Faf du Plessis (CSK), 2021
Article Summary: Karun nair scores 22-ball fifty in delhi capitals' chase against mumbai indians. His explosive assault on bumrah in the powerplay, including two sixes and a four, shifted the momentum after an early setback. Despite tilak varma's earlier 59 for mi, nair's fireworks put delhi in a strong position.

Article Title: Alex Ovechkin's wife Anastasia Shubskaya gets $280K diamond ring from Wayne Gretzky’s wife after record-breaking goal
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin with wife Anastasia Shubskaya, former NHL player Wayne Gretzky, and Gretzky's wife Janet Jones after scoring his 895th career goal (via Getty Images)


A goal for the ages: Alex Ovechkin breaks Wayne Gretzky's 26-year record FULL Alex Ovechkin Celebration Ceremony After Record-Breaking Goal No. 895 A legacy passed down: Anastasia Shubskaya receives diamond tribute from Janet Gretzky After Alex Ovechkin netted his 895th career goal and broke legendary Wayne Gretzky 's record, Janet Gretzky showed respect to a time-honored hockey tradition by gifting Anastasia Shubskaya , wife of Alex Ovechkin, an eight-carat diamond ring that had been estimated at $280,000. The Capitals may have lost to the New York Islanders by a score of 4-1, but the outcome was an afterthought to a night all about legacy, love, and a new chapter in hockey's history.The moment of history arrived at 7:26 of the second period. Alex Ovechkin let go of a blazing shot through fellow Russian Ilya Sorokin, making himself the NHL's all-time leading goal scorer. Fans inside UBS Arena lost their minds, and Alex Ovechkin commemorated the occasion by executing a belly flop onto the ice—celebrating his big achievement.Alex Ovechkin celebrated this achievement in a pregame ceremony against the Carolina Hurricanes on April 10, 2025. He was given a six-foot sculptural painting by TYP depicting his skates and game-used sticks, with his image on it, with “Most Goals All Time” written on the top and “895 Alex Ovechkin 895” on the bottom.While Alex Ovechkin was absorbing the enormity of his achievement, Anastasia Shubskaya was gifted a symbolic token of the historic night. Continuing a tradition started in 1994, when Colleen Howe (wife of Gordie Howe) gave Janet Gretzky a diamond ring after her husband, Wayne Gretzky, broke Colleen Howe’s husband’s record, Janet Gretzky ensured history repeated itself—this time from one hockey family to another.In an interview with the media, Wayne Gretzky said, “A month ago, my wife said, ‘You know, Colleen Howe started a tradition. I’m not sure if anyone is going to break Alex’s record, but I want to give her (Ovechkin’s wife, Anastasia Shubskaya) something really unique.’ So, we went out and she picked out an eight-diamond ring for Alex’s wife. Not only do hockey guys pass down traditions. So do the families and wives.”The act not only spanned generations of greatness but also underlined the strong relationship between hockey families across generations.Anastasia Shubskaya, who tied the knot with Alex Ovechkin in 2016, is a Russian model who has appeared in numerous Russian magazines during her career and has built a strong social media presence. They are proud parents of two sons- Sergei and Ilya.Shubskaya had posted a cute moment on her Instagram stories when her son intently watched the game while his father was playing, captioning it: "Tuning in for the game" with a smiley face.Also read: “Now the real stuff is coming”: Alex Ovechkin skips The Tonight Show appearance to stay playoff-ready Even though the Capitals fell on the evening, the larger context is one of hope. The team had already secured a playoff berth and now has the emotional tailwind of reaching a once-a-generation milestone. With the NHL playoffs coming, Alex Ovechkin and the Washington Capitals aim to ride the wave of history toward what would be a fairy tale conclusion to the 2025 campaign.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin scored his 895th career goal against the new york islanders on april 10, 2025. Wife anastasia shubskaya was gifted an eight-carat diamond ring that had been estimated at $280,000 by wayne gretzky's wife janet. The capitals lost the game 4-1, but the night was all about legacy, love, and a new chapter in hockey's history.

Article Title: Virat Kohli joins T20 elite, becomes first Indian to slam 100 half-centuries
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli etched his name deeper into cricketing history on Sunday by becoming the first Indian to score 100 half-centuries in T20 cricket . The Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) star achieved the milestone during his unbeaten knock of 62 off 45 balls against Rajasthan Royals at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.This marked Kohli’s third fifty of the ongoing Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 season and took his overall tally to 100 fifties and 9 hundreds in 405 T20 matches. He now sits second on the all-time list of most T20 half-centuries, behind only Australia’s David Warner , who has 108 fifties and 8 centuries from 400 games.Kohli brought up his landmark in style, launching Wanindu Hasaranga over the ropes in the 15th over of the run chase.Chasing 174, Kohli led from the front, stitching a blistering 92-run opening partnership with Phil Salt , who smashed 65 off just 33 balls. He then shared an unbeaten 83-run stand with Devdutt Padikkal (40 off 28), guiding RCB to a thumping nine-wicket win with 15 balls remaining.Earlier, Rajasthan Royals posted a competitive 173/4, built on Yashasvi Jaiswal ’s fluent 75 off 47 deliveries. However, their total proved insufficient against a relentless RCB top order.With this milestone, Kohli not only reaffirmed his status as a modern-day legend but also demonstrated his enduring class in the format. Pakistan’s Babar Azam (90 fifties), Chris Gayle (88), and Jos Buttler (86) follow Kohli on the elite T20 fifty-makers list.
Article Summary: Virat kohli becomes first indian to score 100 half-centuries in t20 cricket. The royal challengers bengaluru star achieved the milestone during his unbeaten knock of 62 off 45 balls against rajasthan royals at the sawai mansingh stadium in jaipur. He now sits second on the all-time list of most t20 half- centuries, behind only australia’s david warner.

Article Title: 'Dhoni isn't a soothsayer ...': Fleming cautions against expecting instant CSK revival
Article Text:
MS Dhoni (left) speaks to CSK head coach Stephen Fleming during the practice session. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Will CSK's performance improve with MS Dhoni back as captain? Not sure, time will tell Unlikely, they need more than that Possibly, if players respond Definitely, his experience matters

'I was under pressure': SRH's Abhishek Sharma after a record 141 against Punjab Kings

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings head coach Stephen Fleming admitted that turning around their woeful IPL 2025 campaign would be a "big challenge," emphasising that MS Dhoni’s return as captain, following Ruturaj Gaikwad’s injury, is not a magical solution."His [Dhoni's] influence will always be prominent, but he's not a soothsayer, he hasn't got a magic wand," Fleming told reporters ahead of CSK’s clash with Lucknow Super Giants on Monday. "He can't just rub it over the side otherwise he would have brought it out earlier. It's a case of us working very hard along with MS to turn it around and certainly in both of our cricketing careers, we've been in situations that require a lot of energy and we've got to make sure that the energy is put in the right place."With five consecutive defeats leaving CSK anchored at the bottom of the table, including a crushing loss to KKR where they posted their lowest-ever total at Chepauk (103/9), Fleming said the squad is hurting and undergoing deep introspection."The disappointing aspect in particular the last game was the lack of competition we put up and that hurt a lot," he said. "There’s certainly been a lot of internal soul-searching… but it’s not about words, it’s about players grabbing the moment, finding form, and shaking off apprehension."Fleming also reflected on the broader nature of T20 cricket: "I know there’s a fascination with power and six-hitting, but there’s still room for craft… I’d be very sad if it just became a baseball competition."Looking ahead to Monday’s game against a high-flying LSG, Fleming confirmed Shivam Dube is likely to be fit and stressed the importance of containing Nicholas Pooran. "He’s the best player in the world at the moment by some distance — consistent, powerful and a real threat."
Article Summary: Csk head coach stephen fleming admits that turning around their woeful ipl 2025 campaign would be a "big challenge" fleming emphasised that ms dhoni’s return as captain, following ruturaj gaikwad's injury, is not a magical solution. Shivam dube is likely to be fit and stressed the importance of containing nicholas pooran.

Article Title: Will Taylor Swift accompany Travis Kelce to the Kentucky Derby this year? Here's what fans think
Article Text:
Travis Kelce at last year's Kentucky Derby. Source: Facebook

Fans believe Taylor Swift will join Travis Kelce at the Kentucky Derby this year in May



The Kentucky Derby is only a few days away; the Derby is America's most prestigious annual horse race and is scheduled to be held on May 3. The Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce was present at the iconic race last year, held at Churchill Downs and wore a sharp suit and tophat. And now fans are speculating whether Travis will make an appearance at this year’s Derby along with his famous girlfriend Taylor Swift.An insider from celebrity news platform Deuxmoi has revealed that Travis Kelce wants to rent a private box for the Derby, which holds six guests. This revelation has sparked curiosity about who might join him.Taylor was not with Travis at the Derby last year, as she was focusing on her international Eras Tour that was set to launch in Paris shortly.This year Taylor and Travis have been keeping a low profile since Travis and his team lost out on the Super Bowl. This raises questions about whether Taylor might join Travis for the festivities. It’s possible that Travis will be accompanied by his brother Jason or his teammates or members from his entourage. However, fans believe Taylor may be with him at the Derbys this year since she does not seem to have a major commitment in early May.Travis had opened up about his Derby experience during one of the episodes of his New Heights podcast."I'm a Derby guy now, man," he said on the podcast. "It was so much fun." While Jason Kelce had been to the famous race multiple times during his college days at the University of Cincinnati, this was Travis Kelce's first time at the Derbys.“It was a once-in-a-lifetime experience that I am definitely going to try and experience again,” he said on the podcast. “It was fun just being part of the entire environment.”
Article Summary: Fans believe taylor swift will join travis kelce at the kentucky derby this year. The kansas city chiefs tight end was present at the iconic race last year. An insider from celebrity news platform deuxmoi has revealed that travis wants to rent a private box for the derby, which holds six guests.

Article Title: Umpires stop play to check Shimron Hetmyer, Phil Salt's bats during RR vs RCB – Here's what happened
Article Text:
Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Why was Hetmyer's bat size checked by the umpire?

ACCORDING TO THE RULES:

The blade dimensions are restricted to:

PAST INCIDENT:

NEW DELHI: An unusual incident occurred when the umpire inspected Simron Hetmyer's bat dimensions upon his arrival at the crease during the Indian Premier League (IPL) match between Rajasthan Royals and Royal Challengers Bengaluru at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.Following Yashasvi Jaiswal's dismissal on the final delivery of the 16th over, Hetmyer entered at the fifth position for the Royals, joining Dhruv Jurel at the crease whilst the home team sought to accelerate their scoring rate.The game experienced a momentary pause as the official utilised a bat gauge to verify whether Hetmyer's bat conformed to regulation specifications.Subsequently, the umpire conducted an identical inspection for RCB's opening batsman Phil Salt before their batting innings commenced.During an IPL match, the on-field umpire decided to inspect Shimron Hetmyer ’s bat to ensure it complied with the league’s regulations. This routine check was conducted to verify that the West Indies star's bat met the specifications outlined under Law 5.7 of the IPL playing conditions, which govern bat dimensions.Hetmyer's bat successfully passed the inspection.The IPL regulations do not specify any point penalties for such violations, and it appears that if Hetmyer's bat had failed to comply with the standards, he would have simply been instructed to use a different bat.The overall length of the bat, including the handle, must not exceed 38 inches (96.52 cm).Width: 4.25 inches (10.8 cm)Depth: 2.64 inches (6.7 cm)Edges: 1.56 inches (4.0 cm)The bat must also be able to pass through a bat gauge, as specified.The handle must not be more than 52% of the total length of the bat.Any covering material on the blade must not exceed 0.04 inches (0.1 cm) in thickness.The protective material on the toe of the bat must not be thicker than 0.12 inches (0.3 cm).In the previous season, a significant incident occurred in the English County Championship when Essex received a 12-point deduction after their batsman Feroze Khushi's bat failed to meet size regulations during a match with Nottinghamshire.The incident took place when Khushi was on 21 runs from 27 deliveries, requiring him to switch his bat.This sanction ultimately affected Essex's championship aspirations against Surrey. Without the point deduction, Essex would have secured third position instead of their eventual fourth-place finish.
Article Summary: Rajasthan royals batsman simron hetmyer was inspected by the umpire during an ipl match against royal challengers bengaluru in jaipur. The official used a bat gauge to check that het myer's bat conformed to regulation specifications. An identical inspection was carried out for rcb's opening batsman phil salt before their batting innings commenced.

Article Title: Watch: Alex Ovechkin’s better-half Nastasiya goes viral for her message to Wayne Gretzky after historic night
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin (via: Getty Images)

Ovechkin’s shot made history, Nastasiya’s words made headlines



Alexander Ovechkin Gets The Capitals Rolling Quickly With Goal No. 896

Special thank you to Wayne and Janet Gretzky for their kindness and genuine treatment of our family,”

“It is a great honor for us!”

The story behind Ovechkin’s greatest goal



The injuries, worries, stress, pressure… the way you overcome each challenge is inspiring,”

It’s such a big honor to know him, to have dinner with him, and obviously, to break his record.”

When a sports icon breaks a seemingly unbreakable record, the moment becomes more than just a stat, it becomes a story. And on April 6, Alex Ovechkin turned that story into history. With a precise wrist shot in the second period against the New York Islanders, the Washington Capitals ’ left wing etched his name above Wayne Gretzky ’s on the NHL ’s all-time goal-scoring list. But behind that monumental goal was a wave of emotion, family support, and a powerful gesture of respect from the man he surpassed.While the hockey world celebrated Ovechkin’s jaw-dropping feat, his wife, Nastasiya, made sure the spotlight extended beyond the ice. She shared a deeply personal video from UBS Arena, showing their sons Sergei and Ilya, and Ovechkin’s mother, Tatyana, delivering touching messages that lit up the jumbotron during a special ceremony. The family’s heartfelt tribute added a personal layer to a globally recognized achievement.In a moving Instagram post, Nastasiya penned an open letter to fans and supporters. But what stood out was her gratitude to Wayne and Janet Gretzky present that evening for their class and generosity. “she wrote.This wasn’t just a passing of the torch, it was a celebration of legacy, sportsmanship, and unity across generations.For Nastasiya, Ovechkin’s path to the top wasn’t just about goals scored, it was about battles fought in silence. “she wrote. Her words offered fans a rare look behind the scenes, into the resilience it takes to make history.Even NHL legend Wayne Gretzky acknowledged the moment with grace, gifting Ovechkin a stunning oil painting during the post-goal ceremony. “They say records are made to be broken,” Gretzky said, “but I’m not sure who’s going to get more goals than that.”Also Read: Alexander Nikishin joins Carolina Hurricanes: Could He Be playoff spark Carolina needs? Ovechkin, ever humble, called Gretzky “the greatest,” saying, “As the Capitals clinch another Metropolitan Division title, this moment feels like more than a career milestone, it’s a celebration of grit, gratitude, and greatness.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin broke wayne gretzky's all-time nhl goal-scoring record on april 6. His wife, nastasiya, shared a moving tribute to fans and supporters. The family’s heartfelt tribute added a personal layer to a globally recognized achievement.

Article Title: “Hoping it’s not too long”: Yankees’ manager Aaron Boone reacts to Marcus Stroman’s injury update
Article Text:
Yankees’ manager Aaron Boone reacts after Marcus Stroman’s injury update (Image Source: Getty)

What happened to Yankees’ Marcus Stroman?

Yankees’ manager Aaron Boone hopes for a quick return

“Hoping it’s not long, the MRI was good, but he had some swelling in there somewhere. Trying to eliminate that, hopefully get him ramped up pretty quick and hopefully it’s something that really helps him moving forward.”

“I think that was due to the knee.”

It has been a difficult time for the New York Yankees, after their pitcher Marcus Stroman injured his left knee, and was sent to the 15-day injured list. Stroman received a cortisone shot that worked on helping in reducing the swelling, however, the tests show no serious damage. Meanwhile, Yankees’ manager Aaron Boone is hoping for Stroman to recover quickly.During his last game, Marcus Stroman might have been left injured, following which, he gave up five runs and struggled to finish his pitches properly. It was likely because of the knee issue.Well, so far in the game, Stroman has given up at least 12 runs in just over 9 innings. Stroman’s injury could hurt his chance to earn an $18 million option next year, which depends on how many innings he pitches.Media reports claimed that Clarke Schmidt will be taking Stroman’s spot. Schmidt will be coming back from the injured list. He will be making his season debut on Wednesday against the Kansas City Royals at Yankee Stadium.Due to his injuries, Schmidt faced issues with his back and shoulder, but he managed to secure 61 pitches and claims he’s doing well.The New York Yankees’ team manager, Aaron Boone shared an update with the media. He said that while Marcus Stroman has been sent to 15-day injured list due to left knee inflammation, the MRI exam has revealed swelling, but nothing beyond that.Further, Boone reacted and said he hopes that Stroman’s injury is not too bad and he’s able to recover from it quickly. Boone said:When Boone watched video back from that start, he said he could notice Stroman’s injuries as he was not finishing his delivery properly on his front (left) leg. He said:Also Read: Yankees Replace Injured Marcus Stroman With A Triple-A Pitcher
Article Summary: Yankees’ manager aaron boone reacts after marcus stroman’s injury update. He said that while stroman has been sent to 15-day injured list due to left knee inflammation, the mri exam has revealed swelling, but nothing beyond that. Stroman received a cortisone shot that worked on helping in reducing the swelling.

Article Title: Superstition busted! Abhishek Sharma's parents revel in son's historic six-fest in Hyderabad
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma with his parents after slamming a record-breaking century for SRH against PBKS in IPL 2025. (Image: BCCI/IPL)

Poll Should parents always attend their children's sporting events for support? No, players should focus on the game Yes, it's important for emotional support

Parents' presence

The maturity

New Delhi: After the match between Sunrisers Hyderabad and Punjab Kings , Arshdeep Singh greeted Abhishek Sharma ’s parents in the stands."Uncle ji, jehda aashirvaad enhu daindo o, oh wala deo mainu v…same chahida mainu (Uncle, give me the blessings you give to Abhishek… I want the same)," Arshdeep said. Arshdeep, who has played with Abhishek since their U-14 days, was referring to his friend’s remarkable 55-ball 141 against his team on Saturday night in Hyderabad."I told him there is no difference between him and Abhi for me. I have seen them playing together since they didn't even know how to lace their boots," Abhishek Sharma’s father, Raj Kumar Sharma , recounted their conversation with TimesofIndia.com from Hyderabad.Raj Kumar Sharma had never watched his son play live from the stadium in the IPL . It was his first time cheering for his son in person."I am superstitious. I used to think he wouldn't do well if I was there. Even last night, when he was dismissed off a no-ball, for those 30 seconds, I started blaming myself," Abhishek's father laughed."Then the sixes started landing among the crowd. I was on my feet throughout his knock," he added.Sunrisers had a flying start to the tournament with a resounding 44-run win over Rajasthan Royals. Subsequently, they lost four consecutive matches. A dejected Abhishek, struggling to find his form, requested his mother to join him. Before Saturday, Abhishek had managed only 51 runs in five outings."He booked the tickets. I was a bit hesitant to go. But then he called and convinced me to fly to Hyderabad," Raj Kumar Sharma recalled.At the post-match presentation, the 24-year-old left-hander mentioned how the entire Sunrisers' management was waiting for his family to arrive from Amritsar."I have been waiting for them. My whole team was waiting for my parents because they have been lucky for SRH," Abhishek said.Abhishek's mother, Manju Sharma , believes things will turn around for the Sunrisers after this win."Sab ko Khushi hai, ma ko bhi Khushi hai, pure Hyderabad ko Khushi hai ki hum match jeete hai (Everyone is happy, I am happy too. The entire Hyderabad is celebrating that we won the match)," Manju said in a video posted by the IPL."Thoda stop lag gaya tha lekin ab nahi lagega, ab continue chalega (There was a lean patch, but now the team will continue to do well)," she added.Abhishek, elated with his parents cheering for him from the stands, expressed his emotions. "You ask any cricketer, the blessings a mother gives you come straight from the heart."Last year, on Abhishek Sharma’s birthday, September 4, his mentor Yuvraj Singh posted a video on Instagram with the caption: “Hope you take as many singles this year as you knock out of the park.”In the video, Yuvraj can be seen getting irritated with Abhishek trying to hit every ball out of the park, saying: “Single bhi le lo Maharaj (Take a single at least).”The video ends with another Yuvraj taunt: “Tu na sudhre bas, chakke maari jaaye, thalle na kheli (You are not going to listen… you are only hitting sixes, try and hit along the ground also).”On Saturday, when Abhishek took singles at 98 and 99 to complete his century, it stunned his mentor Yuvraj Singh.The former India cricketer even wrote on X: "Waah Sharma ji ke bete! 98 pe single phir 99 pe single! Itni maturity hazam nahi ho rahi (Well played, Abhishek! I can't digest the fact that you have matured and are taking singles at 98 and 99)."Abhishek Sharma's father was also pleasantly surprised. He said, "The great thing about the knock was he didn't throw away his wicket after scoring his century. I was nervous when he was on 98, praying he would just take a single and complete his century."After this knock, Raj Kumar Sharma's superstition is dispelled, and he now plans to stay with his son and cheer for him in every match, not returning to Amritsar anytime soon.
Article Summary: Abhishek sharma scored a record-breaking 141 for sunrisers hyderabad against punjab kings in ipl 2025. His father raj kumar sharma had never watched his son play live from the stadium in the ipl. The 24-year-old left-hander had managed only 51 runs in five outings before saturday.

Article Title: The Masters 2025: Rory McIlroy wins at Augusta National, completes career Grand Slam
Article Text:
Rory McIlroy with his wife Erica Stoll, and daughter Poppy, holds the trophy after winning the Masters golf tournament. (AP)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Why Washington Sundar credits Gautam Gambhir for improving his game?

Rory McIlroy secured his first Masters victory and completed golf's career Grand Slam on Sunday at Augusta National , defeating Justin Rose in a sudden-death playoff with a four-foot birdie putt. The world number two from Northern Ireland overcame multiple setbacks during the final round, including squandering the solo lead three times, to join the elite group of players who have won all four major championships.McIlroy's historic triumph came after 17 attempts at the Masters, making him the sixth golfer alongside Jack Nicklaus, Tiger Woods, Gary Player, Gene Sarazen, and Ben Hogan to achieve the career Grand Slam."It feels incredible. This is my 17th time here. I was wondering if it would ever be my time. I'm thrilled and so proud to be able to call myself a Masters champion," McIlroy said.The victory earned McIlroy a record $4.2 million prize from the tournament's $21 million purse, along with the coveted green jacket ."The last 10 years coming here with the burden of the Grand Slam on my shoulders and trying to achieve that, I'm sort of wondering what we're all going to talk about going into next year's Masters," McIlroy reflected.The dramatic finale unfolded when McIlroy needed a par on the 72nd hole to win but hit his approach into a greenside bunker and missed a five-foot par putt, forcing a playoff with Rose at 11-under 277."My battle today was with myself. How I responded to setbacks, that's what I'll take from this week," McIlroy stated.In the playoff, Rose's approach landed 15 feet from the hole, while McIlroy placed his shot within four feet. After Rose missed his birdie attempt, McIlroy made his putt to clinch the victory."I've dreamed about that moment for as long as I can remember," McIlroy said.The emotional win triggered an outpouring of feelings as McIlroy dropped to his knees on the 18th green, crying and later embracing his caddie Harry Diamond, wife, and daughter while fans chanted his name."There was a lot of pent up emotion that came out on that 18th green. A moment like that makes all the years and all the close calls worth it," McIlroy shared.The 35-year-old's journey to victory included overcoming a double-bogey start that erased his initial two-shot lead, briefly falling behind Bryson DeChambeau before reclaiming the lead through two-shot swings on consecutive holes."I would say it was 14 years in the making, from going out with a four-shot lead in 2011 and feeling I could have done something there," McIlroy recalled, referencing his previous Masters disappointment.McIlroy's final round of 73 included a double-bogey at the par-five 13th and a bogey at 14, but he responded with crucial birdies at the 15th and 17th holes."It's the best day of my golfing life. I'm very proud of myself for never giving up and always fighting back," McIlroy declared.Rose mounted a strong challenge with a closing round of 66, including birdies on six of the last eight holes, but ultimately fell short in the playoff.The victory marked McIlroy's third title of the year, following wins at The Players Championship and the Pebble Beach Pro-Am, bringing his career US PGA Tour victories to 29.
Article Summary: Rory mcilroy completed golf's career grand slam on sunday at augusta national. The world number two from northern ireland defeated justin rose in a sudden-death playoff with a four-foot birdie putt. The historic triumph came after 17 attempts at the masters, making him the sixth golfer alongside jack nicklaus, tiger woods, gary player, gene sarazen, and ben hogan to achieve the grand slam.

Article Title: Disqualified from Olympics for being overweight, Vinesh Phogat opts for Rs 4 crore over government job
Article Text:
Vinesh Phogat (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Wrestler-turned-politician Vinesh Phogat has opted for a cash prize of Rs 4 crore from the Haryana government after being offered benefits equivalent to an Olympic silver medallist.The 30-year-old athlete was disqualified from the 2024 Paris Olympics for being overweight ahead of her gold medal bout in the 50-kg category.Also See: CSK vs KKR Live Score, IPL 2025 Phogat, a three-time Olympian, had led protests against the former Wrestling Federation of India (WFI) chief Brij Bhushan Singh .She successfully contested the Haryana Assembly elections from Julana in Jind district last year on a Congress ticket.Recently, the Haryana government offered Phogat three choices under its sports policy: a cash prize of Rs 4 crore, an Outstanding Sportsperson (OSP) job under Group 'A', or a Haryana Shehri Vikas Pradhikaran (HSVP) plot.After considering the options, Phogat submitted a letter to the state sports department on Tuesday, informing them of her decision to accept the cash award, official sources confirmed it to PTI.Chief Minister Nayab Singh Saini had previously announced that the Haryana cabinet had decided to offer Phogat benefits equivalent to those of an Olympic silver medallist under the state's sports policy.During the Haryana Assembly's Budget Session in March, Phogat had reminded Saini of his promise to honour her like a medallist after her disqualification from the Paris Olympics."It is not about money, it is about respect. Many people from across the state tell me that I must have received the cash award," Phogat said.Saini acknowledged that Phogat was disqualified from the Paris Olympics due to a procedural decision and called her "Haryana's pride".He assured that he would not allow her honour to be diminished.
Article Summary: Vinesh phogat has opted for a cash prize of rs 4 crore from the haryana government. The 30-year-old athlete was disqualified from the 2024 paris olympics for being overweight ahead of her gold medal bout in the 50-kg category.
